SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.Observer

Interface InputObserver

All Known Implementing Classes:
ClientController
public interface InputObserver
Interface used to implement the Observer-Observable pattern between Cli and ClientController. This interface allows ClientController to observe Cli. It contains methods to send a client request for server or generally a messageToServer. These are raw messages that will be created and standardized in ClientController. Every method contains an input or a request from Client
